### Introduction

First-year MS student in Biostatistics  
Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health

### Experience

Before coming to Columbia University, I completed my undergraduate degree in Computer Science and Technology at Northeast Normal University in Changchun, China (2018-2022). Following that, I worked as a lab technician at the Beijing Center for Brain Science and Brain-Inspired Intelligence for two years (2022-2024), where my primary responsibility was performing behavioral data analysis using Python.  


If you'd like to learn more about my academic and professional experience, please see the "About" page.
